text:
I'm back in Canada and one of the first things
that I always love to do is to go out and

play ice hockey and there is no better spot
than an outdoor rink.

I've got my hockey stick and I've got my skates
down here.
Now it is time to hit the ice.

This is my first time playing hockey in several
years and I'm really rusty as you can see.

I'm not doing the best job stick handling
but it is still a lot of fun.

This outdoor rink is nothing but a converted
basically a tennis court in the summer.

What they do is just have someone come here
and flood the ice every night so that it is

smooth and skate-able, so people can skate
on it.
This is the complete view of the entire thing.
